    • Method Detail

      • setBranch

        public void setBranch(java.lang.String branchName)
        Description copied from interface: MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Sets the name of the branch on which the resulting transaction should operate.

        By default, this is set to ChronoDBConstants.MASTER_BRANCH_IDENTIFIER.

        Specified by:
        setBranch in interface MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Parameters:
        branchName - The branch name. Must not be null.

      • getBranch

        public java.lang.String getBranch()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionConfigurationInternal
        Returns the branch on which the resulting transaction should operate.
        Specified by:
        getBranch in interface TransactionConfigurationInternal
        Returns:
        The branch. Never null.

      • setTimestamp

        public void setTimestamp(long timestamp)
        Description copied from interface: MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Sets the timestamp on which the resulting transaction should operate.

        By default, this is set to the "now" timestamp of the branch. To reset it to the now timestamp after calling this method, please use MutableTransactionConfiguration.setTimestampToNow().

        Specified by:
        setTimestamp in interface MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp. Must not be negative.

      • getTimestamp

        public java.lang.Long getTimestamp()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionConfigurationInternal
        Returns the timestamp on which the resulting transaction should operate.
        Specified by:
        getTimestamp in interface TransactionConfigurationInternal
        Returns:
        The configured timestamp, or null if the transaction should operate on the "now" timestamp of the target branch.

      • setTimestampToNow

        public void setTimestampToNow()
        Description copied from interface: MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Sets the timestamp on which the resulting transaction should operate to the "now" timestamp of the target branch.
        Specified by:
        setTimestampToNow in interface MutableTransactionConfiguration

      • isThreadSafe

        public boolean isThreadSafe()
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
        Checks if this transaction is thread-safe, i.e. may be shared among multiple threads.
        Specified by:
        isThreadSafe in interface ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
        Returns:
        true if the transaction is thread-safe, otherwise false.

      • setThreadSafe

        public void setThreadSafe(boolean threadSafe)
        Description copied from interface: MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Enables or disables thread-safety on this transaction.

        Important note: ChronoDB instances themselves are always thread-safe. This property only determines if the resulting ChronoDBTransaction itself may be shared among multiple threads or not.

        Specified by:
        setThreadSafe in interface MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Parameters:
        threadSafe - Set this to true if thread-safety on the transaction itself is required, otherwise set it to false to disable thread-safety.

      • isBlindOverwriteProtectionEnabled

        public boolean isBlindOverwriteProtectionEnabled()
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
        Checks if blind overwrite protection is enabled on this transaction.
        Specified by:
        isBlindOverwriteProtectionEnabled in interface ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
        Returns:
        true if blind overwrite protection is enabled, otherwise false.

      • setBlindOverwriteProtectionEnabled

        public void setBlindOverwriteProtectionEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Enables or disables blind overwrite protection on this transaction.
        Specified by:
        setBlindOverwriteProtectionEnabled in interface MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Parameters:
        enabled - Set this to true to enable blind overwrite protection, or to false in order to disable it.

      • getDuplicateVersionEliminationMode

        public DuplicateVersionEliminationMode getDuplicateVersionEliminationMode()
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
        Returns the DuplicateVersionEliminationMode associated with this transaction.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        mode - The mode to use. Must not be null.

      • isReadOnly

        public boolean isReadOnly()
        Description copied from interface: ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
        Checks if this transaction is read-only.

        Read-only transactions throw a TransactionIsReadOnlyException if a modifying method, such as ChronoDBTransaction.put(String, Object), is called.

        Specified by:
        isReadOnly in interface ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
        Returns:
        true if this transaction is read-only, otherwise false.

      • setReadOnly

        public void setReadOnly(boolean readOnly)
        Description copied from interface: MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Sets the read-only mode of this transaction configuration.
        Specified by:
        setReadOnly in interface MutableTransactionConfiguration
        Parameters:
        readOnly - Set this to true if the transaction should be read-only, or to false if it should be read-write.

      • freeze

        public void freeze()
        Description copied from interface: MutableTransactionConfiguration
        "Freezes" the configuration.

        After calling this method, no further modifications to the transaction configuration will be allowed.

        Specified by:
        freeze in interface MutableTransactionConfiguration
